00051 /**
00052  * @brief Object for making new analysis streams from a text
00053  * specification. Encapsulates all the work of separately making
00054  * chipstream, pm adjuster and quantification methods.
00055  */
00056 class AnalysisStreamFactory {
00057 
00058 public:
00059 
00060   /**
00061    * Constructor.
00062    * @param What type of Quantification method will be used? I.e.
00063    * Expression, GenoType, ...
00064    */
00065   AnalysisStreamFactory(QuantMethodFactory::QuantType type = QuantMethodFactory::Expression) : m_QuantMethFac(type) {
00066     m_QuantType = type;
00067     m_Docs.push_back(AnalysisStreamExpression::explainSelf());
00068     m_Creators.push_back(&AnalysisStreamExpression::newObject);
00069     // pca-select probes stream.
00070     m_Docs.push_back(AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::explainSelf());
00071     m_Creators.push_back(&AnalysisStreamExpPcaSel::newObject);
00072     // spect-select probes stream.
00073     m_Docs.push_back(AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::explainSelf());
00074     m_Creators.push_back(&AnalysisStreamExpSpectSel::newObject);
00075 
00076         m_uiCelFileCount = 0;
00077   };
00078 
00079   /** Destructor. */
00080   ~AnalysisStreamFactory() {
00081     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_GcControlProbes.size(); i++) {
00082       delete m_GcControlProbes[i];
00083     }
00084   }
00085 
00086   /**
00087    * @brief Factory for created AnalysisStreams from a string description
00088    *
00089    * @param s - String description.
00090    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00091    * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00092    *
00093    * @return analysis stream requested.
00094    */
00095   AnalysisStream *constructAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout,
00096                                           std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00097                                           std::string analysisName = "");
00098

00101  /**
00102    * @brief Factory for creatng mRNA expression AnalysisStream from a string description.
00103    *
00104    * @param s - String description.
00105    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00106    * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00107    *
00108    * @return analysis stream requested.
00109    */
00110   AnalysisStreamExpression *constructExpressionAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout,
00111                                                               std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00112                                                               std::string analysisName = "");
00113 
00114   AnalysisStreamExpression *constructExpressionAnalysisStages(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, 
00115                                                                std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00116                                                               std::string analysisName);
00117   
00118   /**
00119    * @brief Factory for creatng Genotype SNP chip AnalysisStream from a string description.
00120    *
00121    * @param s - String description.
00122    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00123    * @param stdMethods - Aliases for standard methods like RMA.
00124    *
00125    * @return analysis stream requested.
00126    */
00127   AnalysisStreamGType *constructGTypeAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout,
00128                                                     std::map<std::string,std::string> &stdMethods,
00129                                                     std::string analysisName = "");
00130 
00131 
00132   /**
00133    * @brief Factory for created AnalysisStreams from a string description
00134    *
00135    * @param s - String description.
00136    * @param layout - Probe and probe set info.
00137    * @param analysisName -
00138    * @return analysis stream requested.
00139    */
00140   AnalysisStream *constructAnalysisStream(const std::string& s, ChipLayout &layout, std::string analysisName = "") {
00141     std::map<std::string,std::string> stdMethods;
00142     return constructAnalysisStream(s, layout, stdMethods, analysisName);
00143   }
00144 
00145   /**
00146    * @brief Load up a list of probes from a .bgp file
00147    *
00148    * @param fileName - name of bgp file.
00149    * @param controlProbes - vector to be filled in with probes.
00150    */
00151   static void probeListFromBgpFile(const std::string& fileName,
00152                                    std::vector<Probe *> &controlProbes);
00153 
00154   /**
00155    * Specify the probes that should be used for gc controls
00156    * @param gcControlProbes - Which probes are considered background.
00157    */
00158   void setGcControlProbes(const std::vector<Probe *> &gcControlProbes) {
00159     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < m_GcControlProbes.size(); i++) {
00160       delete m_GcControlProbes[i];
00161     }
00162     m_GcControlProbes.clear();
00163     for(unsigned int i = 0; i < gcControlProbes.size(); i++) {
00164       Probe *p = Probe::cloneProbe(*gcControlProbes[i]);
00165       m_GcControlProbes.push_back(p);
00166     }
00167     m_QuantMethFac.setGcControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00168     m_PmAdjustFac.setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00169     m_CsFac.setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00170   }
00171 
00172   /**
00173    * Get the vector of probes that are considered to be background.
00174    * @return vector of the probe pointers that are being used.
00175    */
00176   const std::vector<Probe *> &getGcControlProbes() {
00177     return m_GcControlProbes;
00178   }
00179 
00180   /**
00181    * Parse the feature responses from a text file.  File must be tab
00182    * delimited and contain the columns: "probeset_id", "atom_id",
00183    * and "feature_response"
00184    *
00185    * @param fileName - file containing feature responses.
00186    */
00187   void readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(int iProbeCount, const std::string& fileName, const ChipLayout layout) {
00188     m_QuantMethFac.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFromFile(iProbeCount, fileName, layout);
00189   }
00190 
00191   void readPrecompFeatureEffectsFrom_A5(int iProbeCount, affx::File5_Group* group5,
00192                                         const std::string& name, const ChipLayout layout) {
00193     m_QuantMethFac.readPrecompFeatureEffectsFrom_A5(iProbeCount, group5, name, layout);
00194   }
00195 
00196   /**
00197    * Read in the control probes from a text file. File must be tab
00198    * delimited and contain columns named "probe_id" and "gc_count"
00199    *
00200    * @param fileName - file containing the control probes.
00201    */
00202   void readControlProbes(const std::string& fileName) {
00203     probeListFromBgpFile(fileName, m_GcControlProbes);
00204     m_QuantMethFac.setGcControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00205     m_PmAdjustFac.setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00206     m_CsFac.setControlProbes(m_GcControlProbes);
00207   }
00208 
00209   /**
00210    * Toggle whether or not we're writing out the normalization
00211    * distribution.
00212    * @param writeSketch - true to write out the distrubtion false
00213    * otherwise.
00214    */
00215   void setWriteSketchDir(const std::string &writeSketchDir) {
00216     m_CsFac.setWriteSketchDir(writeSketchDir);
00217   }

00219     m_CsFac.setWriteSketchDir_a5(writeSketchDir);
00220   }

00222     m_CsFac.setWriteSketchGroup_a5(group5);

00324   /**
00325    * Utility function to fill the chipstream and pm adjuster portions of
00326    * analysisstream. Allows functions like constructAnalysisStream() and
00327    * constructExpressionAnalysisStream() to share same methods for doing this
00328    * and then just cap with QuantificationMethod.
00329    *
00330    * @param stream - Stream to be filled in.
00331    * @param layout - Information about layout of probes on chip.
00332    * @param pmSpec - String description of pm adjuster.
00333    * @param chipStreamSpec - Vector of strings describing chipstream modules to be created.
00334    * @param name - Name to be filled in as pm adjusters and chipstream modules are created.
00335    */
00336   void fillInAnalysisStream(AnalysisStream *stream, ChipLayout &layout,
00337                             std::string &pmSpec, std::vector<std::string> &chipStreamSpec,
00338                             std::string &name);
00339 
00340   void fillInAnalysisStages(AnalysisStream *stream,
00341                             ChipLayout &layout,
00342                             const std::string &pmSpec, 
00343                             std::vector<std::string> &chipStreamSpec, 
00344                             std::string &name);
00345 
00346   /// Probes to be used for background distributions.
00347   /// Note that memory is owned elsewhere.
00348   std::vector<Probe *> m_GcControlProbes;
00349   /// What type of quantification are we doing? i.e. Expression, GenoType
00350   QuantMethodFactory::QuantType m_QuantType;
00351   /// Self documentation
00352   std::vector<SelfDoc> m_Docs;
00353   /// Self creation
00354   std::vector<SelfCreate::selfCreator> m_Creators;
00355 
00356   unsigned int m_uiCelFileCount;
